[雪]
Ancient simplification of 䨮 , which is in turn phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *sqʰʷed ): semantic 雨 ( “ rain ” ) + phonetic 彗 ( OC *sɢʷeds, *ɢʷeds, *sɢʷids ) .

[䨮]
Found in small seal script (based on Shuowen Jiezi ). Also found in clerical script .
Listed in various historical dictionaries such as Longkan Shoujian 《 龍龕手鑑 》 (997 AD) and Jiyun 《 集韻 ( Jíyùn ) 》 (1037 AD).
